event.description: Charlie Blackmon lines out sharply to right fielder Hernan Perez.
DJ LeMahieu grounds out, shortstop Orlando Arcia to first baseman Eric Thames.
Carlos Gonzalez called out on strikes.
Nolan Arenado grounds out sharply, third baseman Travis Shaw to first baseman Eric Thames.
Trevor Story strikes out swinging.
Gerardo Parra singles on a soft ground ball to first baseman Eric Thames.
With Mark Reynolds batting, Gerardo Parra caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Manny Pina to second baseman Jonathan Villar.
Mark Reynolds hits a ground-rule double (3) on a line drive .
Tony Wolters reaches on a fielder's choice out, shortstop Orlando Arcia to third baseman Travis Shaw to shortstop Orlando Arcia. Mark Reynolds out at 3rd.
Tyler Chatwood out on a sacrifice bunt, catcher Manny Pina to second baseman Jonathan Villar. Tony Wolters to 2nd.
Charlie Blackmon walks.
DJ LeMahieu grounds into a force out, fielded by shortstop Orlando Arcia. Charlie Blackmon out at 2nd.
Carlos Gonzalez grounds out to first baseman Eric Thames.
Nolan Arenado singles on a fly ball to left fielder Ryan Braun.
Trevor Story strikes out swinging.
Gerardo Parra grounds out, second baseman Jonathan Villar to first baseman Eric Thames.
Mark Reynolds strikes out swinging.
Tony Wolters strikes out swinging.
Tyler Chatwood grounds out, shortstop Orlando Arcia to first baseman Eric Thames.
Pitching Change: Carlos Torres replaces Wily Peralta, batting 9th.
Charlie Blackmon walks.
With DJ LeMahieu batting, wild pitch by Carlos Torres, Charlie Blackmon to 2nd.
DJ LeMahieu walks.
Carlos Gonzalez grounds into a force out, first baseman Eric Thames to shortstop Orlando Arcia. Charlie Blackmon to 3rd. DJ LeMahieu out at 2nd. Carlos Gonzalez to 1st.
Nolan Arenado grounds into a double play, second baseman Jonathan Villar to shortstop Orlando Arcia to first baseman Eric Thames. Carlos Gonzalez out at 2nd.
Trevor Story strikes out swinging.
Gerardo Parra walks.
Mark Reynolds pops out to second baseman Jonathan Villar.
Tony Wolters lines out to center fielder Kirk Nieuwenhuis.
Pitching Change: Corey Knebel replaces Carlos Torres, batting 9th.
Dustin Garneau grounds out, shortstop Orlando Arcia to first baseman Eric Thames.
Charlie Blackmon strikes out on a foul tip.
DJ LeMahieu walks.
Carlos Gonzalez grounds out, second baseman Jonathan Villar to first baseman Eric Thames.
Pitching Change: Taylor Jungmann replaces Corey Knebel, batting 9th, replacing Jesus Aguilar.
Nolan Arenado grounds out, shortstop Orlando Arcia to first baseman Eric Thames.
Trevor Story doubles (2) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Ryan Braun.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Cristhian Adames replaces Gerardo Parra.
Cristhian Adames strikes out swinging.
Mark Reynolds singles on a ground ball to left fielder Ryan Braun. Trevor Story scores.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Stephen Cardullo replaces Jordan Lyles.
Stephen Cardullo hit by pitch. Mark Reynolds to 2nd.
Dustin Garneau walks. Mark Reynolds to 3rd. Stephen Cardullo to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Neftali Feliz replaces Taylor Jungmann, batting 9th.
Charlie Blackmon strikes out on a foul tip.
Jonathan Villar singles on a ground ball to right fielder Carlos Gonzalez.
With Eric Thames batting, Jonathan Villar picked off and caught stealing 2nd base, pitcher Tyler Chatwood to first baseman Mark Reynolds to shortstop Trevor Story.
Eric Thames strikes out on a foul tip.
Ryan Braun grounds out, shortstop Trevor Story to first baseman Mark Reynolds.
Travis Shaw grounds out, second baseman DJ LeMahieu to first baseman Mark Reynolds.
Hernan Perez grounds out, pitcher Tyler Chatwood to second baseman DJ LeMahieu to first baseman Mark Reynolds.
Kirk Nieuwenhuis strikes out swinging.
Manny Pina grounds out, shortstop Trevor Story to first baseman Mark Reynolds.
Orlando Arcia triples (1) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Charlie Blackmon.
Wily Peralta lines into a double play, right fielder Carlos Gonzalez to catcher Tony Wolters. Orlando Arcia out at home.
Jonathan Villar strikes out swinging.
Eric Thames homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field.
Ryan Braun singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Nolan Arenado.
Travis Shaw homers (1) on a fly ball to right field. Ryan Braun scores.
Hernan Perez grounds out, shortstop Trevor Story to first baseman Mark Reynolds.
Kirk Nieuwenhuis strikes out swinging.
Manny Pina flies out to right fielder Carlos Gonzalez.
Orlando Arcia pops out to shortstop Trevor Story.
Wily Peralta singles on a line drive to right fielder Carlos Gonzalez.
Jonathan Villar grounds into a force out, fielded by shortstop Trevor Story. Wily Peralta out at 2nd.
Eric Thames grounds out sharply, second baseman DJ LeMahieu to first baseman Mark Reynolds.
Ryan Braun walks.
With Travis Shaw batting, Ryan Braun advances to 2nd on a balk.
Travis Shaw strikes out swinging.
Hernan Perez doubles (1) on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Charlie Blackmon. Ryan Braun scores.
With Kirk Nieuwenhuis batting, Tyler Chatwood picks off Hernan Perez at 2nd on throw to Trevor Story.
Pitching Change: Jordan Lyles replaces Tyler Chatwood, batting 8th, replacing catcher Tony Wolters.
Defensive Substitution: Dustin Garneau replaces pitcher Tyler Chatwood, batting 9th, playing catcher.
Kirk Nieuwenhuis strikes out on a foul tip.
Manny Pina lines out sharply to center fielder Charlie Blackmon.
Orlando Arcia grounds out, shortstop Trevor Story to first baseman Mark Reynolds.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Jesus Aguilar replaces Corey Knebel.
Jesus Aguilar singles on a ground ball to shortstop Trevor Story.
Jonathan Villar homers (1) on a line drive to right field. Jesus Aguilar scores.
Eric Thames singles on a line drive to center fielder Charlie Blackmon.
Ryan Braun strikes out on a foul tip.
Travis Shaw grounds into a double play, third baseman Nolan Arenado to shortstop Trevor Story to first baseman Mark Reynolds. Eric Thames out at 2nd.
